data.name: Racecar Bed
data.detailed_description:
Relive your childhood in Racecar Bed! A charming Turn-Based RPG / Social Sim. Experience all the 3rd grade shenanigans... school, friendships, and battling nightmare monsters! Stack hard-earned toy bricks into unique attacks to kick enemy butts! Days are limited, so plan carefully!

Fight Nightmares


Nightmare monsters are plaguing your dreams and those around you. Dive in and mess them up!

Craft Skills


Craft your own unique skills to use in battle. Want something cheap and reliable, or powerful and deadly to all? It's your choice.

Hang out with friends


Building friendships in the real world will help you out in the dream world in various ways.

Play your days carefully


You'll have a limited number of days to meet your deadlines. While hanging out with friends will help, there are imminent threats to face that won't wait for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
